snippet: Western diplomats wrote to the director-general of Unesco, Irina Bokova, condemning the decision to award a prize financed by the dictator of Equatorial Guinea.
lead_paragraph: Western diplomats wrote to the director-general of Unesco, Irina Bokova, condemning the decision to award a prize financed by the dictator of Equatorial Guinea.

headline.main: Letters from Western Diplomats Opposing Unesco’s Prize

keywords.value: United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization
